full_summary:
===============

# Request for Proposal: Snowmobiles for Canadian High Arctic Research Station

## Tender Information

* **Tender Reference Number**: WS3830121536
* **Amendment Number**: 2
* **Publication Date**: June 15, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: July 27, 2023, at 14:00:00
* **Amendment Date**: July 18, 2023
* **Contract Status**: Cancelled

## Description

Canada is seeking proposals from Offerors to supply and deliver new fifteen (15) dual rider snowmobile vehicles over a three (3) year period. The snowmobiles will be used to support daily operations at the Canadian High Arctic Research Station (CHARS) campus in Cambridge Bay, Nunavut.

## Tender Requirements

The Offeror must provide new snowmobile vehicles that meet the specifications outlined in the Annex Statement of Requirement. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by July 27, 2023, at 14:00:00 HNE. Only bids submitted by this deadline will be considered responsive.

## Annex Statement of Requirement

Available at: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16599174?extsite=MTY1OTkxNzRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16599174?extsite=MTY1OTkxNzRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

## Contact Information

* **Contracting Authority**: Onwuama Ezechinedu, Nkechi (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Email**: [nkechi.onwuamaezechinedu@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:nkechi.onwuamaezechinedu@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

## Trade Agreements

This procurement is open to Offerors who meet the requirements of the following trade agreements:

* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement
